projects.title: WA DC Control Tower - Operations Analytics Center
projects.description: Single-handedly conceptualized & implemented Control Center based on Daily SWOT Analysis for warehouse operations in Western Australia. Comprehensive analytics solution for operational KPIs and performance tracking.

projects.title: National Commercial Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Developed comprehensive analytics dashboards for commercial performance tracking, KPI monitoring, and supply chain optimization across multiple locations.

projects.title: Logistics Operations Scorecards
projects.description: Successfully implemented Logistics & Operations Scorecards with National level visibility and DC drill-down reports features for comprehensive performance monitoring.

projects.title: Rio Tinto NCR Management System
projects.description: Designed and implemented VBA-based Excel solution for Non-Conformance Report management, achieving 95% accuracy in NCR resolution and earning Employee of the Month award.
